title: Completely renovated 5 bedroom house
posting_body: Come live in this newly renovated 5 bedroom, 2 bath home located just north of University Circle.
This space is the upstairs unit of a duplex.
The house is mid-renovation, and we are replacing everything.
We are adding a beautiful brand new kitchen, new bathrooms, windows, electrical, plumbing, roof, floors.
We are installing free laundry facilities in the basement.
All systems and appliances will be brand new including kitchen appliances, washer/dryer, heater, water heater, air conditioning etc.
You will be the first to live in this brand new space!
Churchill Ave is a nice quiet street with great neighbors, most of whom are long-time residents.
I have met many of the neighbors and they take pride in the neighborhood and community feel of the street.
Walkable to Case Western and all that University Circle has to offer.
Call, text or email Bethany today
